name: Last Bus to Tuscon
description:
You are abandoned in the middle of the desert.

What happened? 

Talk to and make friends along the way.

 Learn the mystery that the desert is hiding.

Controls gamepad or

WASD: to move
Spacebar: To Interact
Shift: to run
Enter: to select

Walkthrough

- get the knife from the vendor and equip it
- talk to the person at the side of the road (not required)
- talk to zombie (either fight or become his friend) you will get a key
- go up untill you see an arch and pass in the main area
- go to the top right of the screen, it will place the key in the keyhole in the skull
- this opens the trapdoor
- talk to the bus driver
- congrats!
